DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine daily teriparatide reduce back pain effectively weekly risedronate woman osteoporosis chronic back pain due spinal bone fracture .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Teriparatide Compared Risedronate Back Pain Women With Spine Fracture Caused Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal woman 45 year old . No period least two year . History back pain start least 2 month prior initial visit ( likely due spinal bone fracture determine investigator ) . Minimum one moderate spinal bone fracture . Beginning pain level least four eleven point scale . Bone Mineral Density ( BMD ) must meet criterion Able read , understand , administer selfquestionnaires . Be willing able use peninjector deliver medication . Are increase risk osteosarcoma . Have active suspect disease affect bone metabolism osteoporosis . Participants already know require procedure repair spinal bone fracture . Abnormal value certain lab test . Anything would make difficult determine back pain due fracture . Poor medical psychiatric condition . Alcohol drug abuse within year study start . Certain malignant neoplasm 5 year prior enrollment . Active liver disease clinical jaundice . Significantly impaired renal function . History nephrolithiasis urolithiasis within 2 year prior enrollment . Known contraindication intolerance risedronate and/or teriparatide therapy . Treatment oral strontium certain therapeutic dos fluoride .
